Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.panels

Class GamePanel

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
javax.swing.JComponent
javax.swing.JPanel
it.polimi.ingsw.client.panels.GamePanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class GamePanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
This panel shows the dashboard of the current player watched and contains all the panels used during the game: a general action panel, SwitchToPlayerPanel and a ScrollPanel.
See Also:
Serialized Form
